title: 25 Crates and not a single Key Fragment.
body:
So as the title says, I have 25 Crates and 0 Key Fragments. Is that common? I mean I'm playing with my friends and they are getting tons of Key Fragments and I'm not.
Is there a drop rate for keys or something that I can look at?
Thank you for your help.
Greetings Glenex

replies.body: Hey Glenex, there is indeed a limit on key fragment drops per the [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide.  They will drop around 12 per ~28 days.  The drop rate is reduced each time you receive one, until it resets around 28 days.  I do see you've been getting quite a few, 3 just this week.  Keep it up and they will come!
